definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to take effect/to go into effect

sentences.english: The minimum allowable values of the energy efficiency and. Energy …
sentences.chinese: 房間空調器機能效限定值與節能評價值。

sentences.english: Classification of the infrared and Raman active vibration modes in Calcite has been derived.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出拉曼光效和紅外光效振動模式的分類。

sentences.english: Then they will always be loyal to him.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們就總會死心塌地的效忠於他了。

sentences.english: Feng admits he does not yet know how well the efforts are working.
sentences.chinese: 馮先生承認他自己也不知道這些努力究竟有沒有效。

sentences.english: This technique has worked for thousands of individuals for hundreds of years.
sentences.chinese: 千百年來，這項技能在成千上萬人身上奏了效。

sentences.english: We found that the thinner the oxide thickness is, the higher the conversion efficiency would be.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現當氧化層厚度較薄時，其轉換效率較高。

sentences.english: Thus, the preparation of the organic field-effect transistor with mixed-contact electrodes is finished.
sentences.chinese: 於是，混合接觸型電極的有機場效晶體管制作完成。

sentences.english: The soldiers swore allegiance to their motherland.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們宣誓效忠於他們的祖國。

sentences.english: We also have another weappon against Justin's allergic nose: a nose sucking machine!
sentences.chinese: 一般市面上的小吸鼻器通常沒什麼效。

sentences.english: Case analysis of china garment network was showed that the proposed method could achieve satisfactory effect.
sentences.chinese: 結合中國服裝網進行實例分析後取得了滿意的效。

sentences.english: High-tech ammonia free formula cleans effectively without leaving streaks or lint.
sentences.chinese: 高科技無氨配方效清潔沒殘餘條痕或線頭。

sentences.english: China should bring in the theory of the issue preclusion validity.
sentences.chinese: 我國應當引入爭點效理論。

sentences.english: This offer is effective subject to the goods' being unsold when your order reach us.
sentences.chinese: 本盤以收到你方訂單時，貨物未出售爲效。

sentences.english: He exacted an oath of loyalty to himself throughout the armed forces, from foot soldier to general.
sentences.chinese: 他強迫武裝部隊的全體官兵宣誓效忠於他本人。
在下願爲夫人效犬馬之勞。

definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

unilateral/one-sided/home remedy/folk prescription(same as 丹方)/single-drug prescription (same as 奇方[ji1 fang1], one of the seven kinds of prescriptions of Chinese medicine 七方[qi1 fang1])/metaphorically. a good solution
good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
